titles: The young-mans unfortunate destiny. It being the true lovers lamentable overthrow. When they devise to tyranize, it often proveth true, that in this snare they do impai[l] both life and fortune too. To the tune of, The doubting virgin.
publisher: Printed for J[onah]. Deacon, at the Angel in Guilt-Spur-Street, without Newgate.,
notes: Date, place of publication and publisher's name from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
